Earnings Call Insights: Corvus Pharmaceuticals (CRVS) Q4 2024

Management View

  • CEO Richard Miller detailed the progress of soquelitinib, emphasizing its potential as a first-in-class oral therapy for immune diseases and cancers. He highlighted the 39% objective response rate from the Phase 1 trial
